    document.querySelectorAll('.remark-item').forEach(el => {
        el.style.display =
            el.dataset.iteration === iterationId ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
}
</script>

<script>
const CURRENT_ITERATION = 46;
const LOGGING_ACTIVE = true;
</script>

<script>
let lastIteration = CURRENT_ITERATION;

// Poll every 2 seconds
if (LOGGING_ACTIVE) {
    setInterval(async () => {
        try {
            const res = await fetch('iteration_logic/logger_iteration_status.php', {
                cache: 'no-store'
            });
            const data = await res.json();

            if (data.iteration > lastIteration) {
                window.location.href =
                    '/logger/logger_index.php?iteration=' + data.iteration;
            }
        } catch (e) {
            // silently ignore
        }
    }, 2000);
}
</script>
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const selected = "";
    if (selected) {
        filterRemarks(selected);
    }
});
</script>
